description: Contents: Perush ha-Mishnah le-Rambam (Ḳodashim) (ff. 1r-206v). Perush ha-Mishnah le-Rambam (Berakhot) (ff. 213r-249v). Perush ha-Mishnah le-Rambam (Nidah) (ff. 250r-282v). Perush ha-Mishnah le-Rambam (Avot) (ff. 285r-313r). (All translated into Hebrew.)
title: Mishnah Commentary
author: Maimonides, Moses
